oops-username-not-available: Oops! The username is not available. Suggested:

recluta-tus-amigos-consigue-recompensas: Recruit your friends and get special rewards.
cuando-tu-amigo-se-registre: When your friend registers and acquires frikiradar UNLIMITED time for the first time, you will get your reward.
si-tu-amigo-compra-tiempo: If your friend buys frikiradar UNLIMITED time you will get 1 month completely FREE that will be added to your account or added to the one you already have.
para-poder-disfrutar-del-programa: To be able to enjoy the "Recruit and win" program and acquire your rewards follow these steps:
tu-amigo-debe-ser-un: Your friend must be a new user, he cannot already be registered in frikiradar.
al-registrarse-debe-indicar-que: When registering, he must indicate that he has known us
momento-que-tu-amigo-aada: At the moment your friend adds frikiradar UNLIMITED time to his account you will get your rewards.
no-hay-lmite-amigos-para: There is no limit of friends to recruit.
incumplimiento-estas-reglas-conllevarn-e: Failure to comply with these rules will result in temporary or permanent expulsion from the application.
frikiradar-est-diseado-para-conocer: frikiradar is designed to meet people through the platform itself. The main activity of your profile, chat and stories is for people to get to know you better, not to send them to third party sites through social media links.
links-redes-sociales-estn-permitidos: Links to social networks are allowed as long as they are not the main objective of your profile
desnudos-imgenes-explcitas-con-contexto: NUDES OR EXPLICIT IMAGES WITH CONTEXT.
envo-mediante-chat-publicacin-imgenes: The sending through chat or publication of explicit images or nudes is always allowed and
no-sea-actividad-principal-cuenta: is not the main activity of the account
no-estn-permitidas-como-foto: They are not allowed as profile picture or sending without consent
independientemente-su-nacionalidad-color: regardless of their nationality, color, ethnicity, sexual identity, gender identity or social class. If you don't feel comfortable here, it's better to leave.

estos-son-dispositivos-con-que: These are the devices with which you have ever logged in to frikiradar. You can remove them or pause notifications.

antes-desactivar-cuenta-lee-estos: Before deactivating the account, read these points:
recuerda-que-aplicacin-sigue-desarrollnd: Remember that the application is still being developed and we have not yet reached all places. Thanks to your help we can reach more people. Tell everyone about frikiradar!
si-un-usuario-es-molesto: If a user is annoying you can block him by entering the options of his profile.

si-quieres-cambiar-tu-nombre: If you want to change your username you can do so with the corresponding option.
sigues-queriendo-desactivar: If you still want to deactivate your account, request a verification code to your email as an additional security measure to deactivate the account.
sigues-queriendo-eliminar: If you still want to delete your account, request a verification code to your email as an additional security measure to delete the account.

tambin-tienes-opcin-desactivar-cuenta: You also have the option to deactivate the account if you might come back later.
una-vez-eliminada-tu-cuenta: Once your account is deleted, all records in our database and your media files will be completely deleted and there will be no option to recover them.

poder-recibir-mensajes-cualquier-usuario: Being able to receive messages from any user, even if they have not indicated that they like me.
mostrar-momento-ltima-vez-que: Show the moment of the last time I entered the application or chat.
no-quiero-que-puedan-ver: I don't want them to be able to see who has given me or to whom I have given kokoro.
mi-perfil-es-visible-pblicamente: My profile is publicly visible from the internet by sharing a URL (only name, avatar, description and likes).
esto-eliminar-datos-configuracin-almacen: This will delete the configuration data stored on your current device. Use it only if you know what you are doing.
tu-seguridad-es-muy-importante: Your security is very important, that's why we propose you to validate your account to increase trust with other users by completing one of the following options:
manera-ms-fiable-verificar-tu: The most reliable way to verify your identity. Send us a selfie photo, matching your profile picture, with clearly visible official identification (NIE, DNI, ID card, passport, driver's license...) to
realizar-un-pago-para-suscribirte: Making a payment to subscribe to frikiradar UNLIMITED allows you to verify your account.

puedes-gestionar-tu-suscripcin-desde: You can manage your subscription from the PayPal settings page.

recibe-una-notificacin-doki-doki: Receive a "Doki doki" notification when the radar finds someone nearby compatible with you.

un-pago-frikiradar-permite-verificar: A payment in frikiradar allows you to verify your account, showing a verification mark next to your name.
al-pulsar-suscribirse-se-te: By pressing "Subscribe", the subscription you choose will be automatically charged. This charge will be made recurrently until you decide to cancel the subscription.

frikiradar-start-journey-message: frikiradar has just started its journey and still has a long way to go. That's why we appreciate your help in making frikiradar known and sharing with your friends.

block-description: They will no longer be able to see you, write to you or interact with you on frikiradar unless you unblock them. If you wish, you can tell us the reason for the block.

ban-description: Tell the user the reason why you are banning them. Add the time (days/hours) if the ban is temporary or leave it blank if it is indefinite.

start-chat-requirements: In order to start a conversation, it is necessary to have common conversation topics or to have received their kokoro ❤️.
